question.body: Which is the most accurate composition of blood components?

response.feedback: Correct. Blood has a liquid portion, known as plasma, in addition to cellular components, which include erythrocytes, leukocytes and platelets. Serum + clotting factors are both found within plasma.
Incorrect. This combination is missing cells.
Incorrect. This combination is missing clotting factors.
Incorrect. This combination is missing cells. Additionally, since plasma consists of serum + clotting factors, this is redundant.

part.hint: Blood consists mostly of plasma and erythrocytes, but also includes leukocytes and platelets.
